scripts.prod-build-and-deploy: rimraf build && webpack -p --optimize-minimize --optimize-dedupe && cd build && rsync -rave "ssh -i /Users/$USER/.ssh/movepin.pem" -r . ec2-user@54.179.174.190:~/movepin/static
scripts.prod-deploy-api: cd api && rsync -rave "ssh -i /Users/$USER/.ssh/movepin.pem" --exclude "node_modules" --exclude ".DS_Store" -r . ec2-user@54.179.174.190:~/movepin && ssh -i "/Users/$USER/.ssh/movepin.pem" ec2-user@54.179.174.190 -t "sudo restart movepin"
scripts.prod-npm-install: ssh -i "/Users/$USER/.ssh/movepin.pem" ec2-user@54.179.174.190 -t "cd movepin && sudo stop movepin && npm install --no-optional --ignore-scripts && sudo start movepin"
